name: Academic Writing Workshop
content: The workshop is designed for students, young scholars and independent researchers who would like to improve their academic writing skills in order to succeed in studies and in career. It is organised to provide maximum hands-on practice for participants. Each session will include explanations, examples, exercises, and texts to help the participants develop techniques for working productively at different stages of the scholarly writing process. Topics will include: Academic Reading and Writing Strategies The Elements of Academic Style Finding and Evaluating Sources Data Analysis Writing a Research Proposal The workshop will be divided into three sessions with breaks for tea, coffee and snacks. All the participants who will attend the workshop will receive certificates. In order to book a place, please fill in the Workshop booking form (http://www.lcir.co.uk/academic-writing-workshop/) and send it by 15 November 2018 to workshops@lcir.co.uk. After you receive a confirmation of booking, please register on http://registration.lcir.co.uk. Registration fee – 65 GBP Venue: Lucy Cavendish College – University of Cambridge Lady Margaret Road Cambridge CB3 0BU
